body: Lmao @theansell do you even support the actual doujin artist? I don’t expect my hentai to be perfect, I just want it to not be plain and monotonous, which many NTR is. But sure, say Vanillafag as if that means anything

Nice copy paste. Not everything has to be the same yet this genre is always the same. Funny. But I guess when you're a rapist you don't really care aslong as you get to read painful things. Please die :]

wishing every "porn content" belike your favourite romantic movie or anime is just a shame, most of ya not even supportin a single doujin artist, don't ya? get a life, vanillafags, go back watch movie or anime instead or use your brain to block the tag you don't like.
